title: Show me our audience targeting options

messages.content: Show me our audience targeting options

Here's an overview of your available audience targeting options across our product inventory:

## Geographic Targeting

Currently active regions:
- **United States (US)** - Primary market, available on all products
- **United Kingdom (UK)** - Secondary market, premium sports & news
- **Canada (CA)** - Available on sports and tech products
- **Germany (DE)** - Limited to Apex Motors campaign
- **Australia (AU)** - Sports inventory only
- **Mexico (MX)** - FreshBite Foods only

## Product Categories

### Sports & Entertainment
- ESPN Premium Sports
- Bleacher Report
- Weather.com

### News & Business
- CNN News
- Forbes Business
- New York Times Premium

### Technology
- TechCrunch

## Available Ad Formats

- **Display**: 300x250, 728x90, 160x600
- **Video**: Pre-roll, Mid-roll (15s, 30s)
- **Native**: In-feed, Content recommendation
- **Audio**: Podcast ads (15s, 30s, 60s)

Would you like me to help you set up targeting for a specific campaign?
